oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carte de visite of Confederate Capt. James P. Burem
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Born in 1839, Capt. Burem Co. G, 31st Tenn. Inf., Regt., CSA, hailed from Hawkins County, Tennessee. He was captured at the fall of Vicksburg, Mississippi in July 1863 and later exchanged. The regiment was redesignated the 39th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., CSA. Burem married Nettie M. Burem while in Vicksburg in April 1863. He was killed at Piedmont, Va. on June 5, 1864. After the war, the cdv was sent to S. A. Cunningham in Nashville for publication in Confederate Veteran Magazine.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Burem, James P.
